TopicTitle: [1.0] "Stage Only" filter on resources tab doesn't show correct amounts of LF/O

Articles.Content:
It seems that the stage only filter button for the resources display in flight does NOT show the correct amounts of LF and O. Instead it shows the entire craft's LF and O loadouts. It does however seem to work for all the other resources.

These three screenshots show it in action: The shot with the longer stick - the throttle is at full, engine was firing. Stage says there's still fuel... There was, but only in the NEXT stage.

KSP 1.0

Mac OSX (10.9.5) Steam Version

Steps to replicate: Go to space in something.
